InfoBox.title: About Liukasbotti
InfoBox.text: The idea of Liukasbotti is to inform its users when it is especially slippery outside, in order to help prevent accidents.
InfoBox.subtitle: How it works
InfoBox.p1: You will receive a notification on your phone when it is unusually slippery outside and extra caution is required.
InfoBox.p2: The warning is sent at the start of slippery conditions.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.q1: How do I get alerts on my phone?
FAQ.from_here: You can subscribe to alerts on your phone here
FAQ.a1/1: Warnings are delivered via SMS. When unusual slipperiness is detected, you will receive an alert directly on your phone.
FAQ.q3: Is the service only available in Helsinki?
FAQ.a3: At the moment, slipperiness alerts are only available for the Helsinki area.
FAQ.q4: Who is responsible for maintaining Liukasbotti?
FAQ.a4: Liukasbotti is maintained by Bravo Digital Inc.
FAQ.q5: I don't want to receive warnings anymore. How can I cancel my subscription?
FAQ.a5: You can cancel your subscription by sending the message STOP to the number 050 902 4308.

controller.title: Controller
controller.name: City of Helsinki – Urban Environment Division (KYMP)
controller.scope: This notice covers personal data processing in the Liukasbotti service.

purpose.title: Purpose of processing
purpose.lead: Liukasbotti sends slipperiness warnings via SMS. We process the minimum data needed to deliver messages.

feedback.desc: Name, email, topic/category and message; optional request for reply

legal.title: Sources, legal bases and recipients

sources.title: Sources of data
sources.desc: Data is primarily obtained from the data subject (join SMS, feedback form).

basis.title: Legal basis
basis.desc: Joining and messaging rely on consent. Technical logging is necessary for service provision, security and continuity (legitimate interests).

legal.notice: No transfers outside the EU/EEA. Server/backup locations: Germany (SMS) and Finland (Bravo Digital hosting).

retention.title: Retention and duration
retention.desc: Data is retained for the duration of the service and legal obligations, per the city’s archiving rules.

items.restriction: right to restriction in certain cases
items.object: right to object where the basis is legitimate interest
items.withdraw: right to withdraw consent at any time
items.complaint: right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority

contact.title: Privacy contact
contact.instructions: You can request access, rectification, withdraw consent or make other privacy-related requests by contacting the controller.
